channel.title: ::starter [508]
channel.description:
I want to make it so when a player types ::starter, that it will let them only do it once, and if they do it again it will send a message to them saying "Sorry (playername), you can only use ::starter once!"
Thanks in advance.

item.title: ::starter [508]
item.dc:creator: @P_I_M_P_3_D_Tut `Lewk_
item.description:
@P_I_M_P_3_D_Tut wrote:

Declare this public int starter = 0;
add this command

if (cmd[0].equals("starter")) { if(starter == 0) { Engine.playerItems.addItem(p,ID,Amount); p.frames.sendMessage("p,MESSAGE"); if(starter == 1){ p.frames.Message("p, Sorry you can only do starter once!"); }
I believe so?

Read full topic
